content: 2 sts remain double_crochet x2 change colour in last yo of row ch1 and turn row 58 *dtr x2 treble_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet x2 half_double_crochet treble_crochet repeat from * until 2 sts remain dtr x2 change colour in last yo of row ch1 and turn row 59 *double_crochet x2 half_double_crochet treble_crochet dtr x2 treble_crochet half_double_crochet repeat from * until 2 sts remain double_crochet x2 change colour in last yo of row ch1 and turn row 60 half_double_crochet in each st across ch1 and turn row 61 treble_crochet x3 *skip 1 st bst repeat from * until 3 sts remain treble_crochet x3 ch1 and turn row 62 half_double_crochet in each st across change colour in last yo of row ch1 and turn row 63 half_double_crochet in each st across ch1 and turn row 64 half_double_crochet in each st across ch1 and turn row 65 half_double_crochet in each st across ch1 and turn row 66 half_double_crochet in each st across change colour in last yo of row ch1 and turn row 67 treble_crochet in each st across ch1 and turn row 68 *double_crochet x5 bb bobble repeat from * until 4 sts remain double_crochet x4 ch1 and turn row 69 treble_crochet in each st across change colour in last yo of row ch1 and turn row 70 half_double_crochet in each st across change colour in last yo of row ch1 and turn row 71 *treble_crochet double_crochet repeat from * across ch1 and turn given to the designers row 72 *treble_crochet double_crochet repeat from * across ch1 and turn row 73 *treble_crochet double_crochet repeat from * across ch1 and turn row 74 *treble_crochet double_crochet repeat from * across ch1 and turn row 75 *treble_crochet double_crochet repeat from * across change colour in last yo of row ch1 and turn row 76 half_double_crochet in each st across ch1 and turn row 77 treble_crochet x3 *skip st treble_crochet working back over the treble_crochet treble_crochet in the skipped st repeat from * until 3 sts remain treble_crochet x3 ch1 and turn row 78 half_double_crochet in each st across change colour in last yo of row ch1 and turn row 79 treble_crochet in each st across ch1 and turn row 80 treble_crochet in each st across ch1 and turn row 81 double_crochet in each st across change colour in last yo of row ch1 and turn row 82 double_crochet x3 *pop double_crochet repeat from * until 3 sts remain double_crochet x3 ch1 and turn row 83 row ch1 and turn row 86 double_crochet x3 *pop double_crochet repeat from * until 3 sts remain double_crochet
